parameters.subject: @body('Parse_mail_configurations_from_json')?['Subject']
parameters.body:
Hi,

The External Agents Italy process is completed. Please find the summary below:

Records Processed: @{variables('RecordsCounter')}
Errors: @{variables('ErrorsCount')}
Not relevant for the account teams update : @{variables('UnprocessedUpsertCounter')}

Status of deletion process: @{variables('DeletionResult')}. @{variables('DeletionCount')} records deleted

The detailed log is attached to this email.
Replies to this email are not monitored.
For any queries or concerns, Please contact AMC team.

Thanks,
AMC Team

inputs.uri: @{parameters('instanceUrl_nonsfs')}/services/data/v55.0/query?q=select id, S4SInterface_Upsert_Date__c from AccountTeamMember WHERE S4SExternal_Source__c = 'External Agent IT' and S4SInterface_Upsert_Date__c < @{variables('CurrentTime')}z
